DOC.brief_summary: Anti-adhesive effect Safety mix solid poloxamer , gelatin chitosan ( Mediclore® ) axillary dissection breast cancer
DOC.brief_title: Anti-adhesive Effect Safety Mixed Solid Poloxamer , Gelatin Chitosan ( Mediclore® ) After Axillary Dissection Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: patient need axillary dissection breast cancer Written inform consent Patients without clinically significant lab patient diagnose 'positive metastasis ' sentinel lymph node biopsy enrol another clinical trial within 1 month Immunosuppression autoimmune disease Anticoagulant , general steroid within week surgery Incompatible medication Serious disease ( heart failure , renal failure , liver failure , uncontrolled hypertension , diabetes mellitus , coagulation deficiency )
